Views¶

notes.views.note_create(request)[source]¶

View to create a new note. :param request: HTTP request object. :return: Rendered template for creating a new note.

notes.views.note_delete(request, pk)[source]¶

View to delete an existing note. :param request: HTTP request object. :param pk: Primary key of the note to be deleted. :return: Redirect to the note list after deletion.

notes.views.note_detail(request, pk)[source]¶

View to display details (creator, date) of a note.

Parameters:

  • request – HTTP request object.

  • pk – Primary key of the note.

Returns:

Rendered template with details of the specified note.

notes.views.note_list(request)[source]¶

Displays all notes. :param request: HTTP request object. :return: Rendered template with a list of sticky notes.

notes.views.note_update(request, pk)[source]¶

View to update an existing note. :param request: HTTP request object. :param pk: Primary key of the note to be updated. :return: Rendered template for updating the specified note.
